xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/32833-Al Murray, The Pub Landlord - My Gaff, My Rules 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/keZavwGpuCVgqYwAdp1Vrb7XnRt.jpg Recorded live in London's Playhouse Theatre, My Gaff, My Rules sees Al Murray's Perrier Award-winning comic creation in top, boisterous ale-swilling form. The Pub Landlord has been compared to the likes of Alf Garnett and Harry Enfield's Loadsamoney character, but that doesn't prepare the viewer for Murray's highly developed and sophisticated lampoon of True Brit values. Since Murray has built up Al Murray, The Pub Landlord - My Gaff, My Rules
